channel.title: ~ [317] VestigePK v1.0 - In Development - Source + Client ~
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]~ VESTIGEPK ~[/b][/size]
VestigePK v1.0 is currently in development, and I just whipped it up via delta source. I'm currently in the process, and in need of, custom items like dclaws, vesta, statius, and etc... If anyone wants to start working on it, I'd be glad to have the help. Its currently the same as delta (whipped up in about 8 hrs) but has different home/features/shops/and some more. Its aimed to be a pk server, and there are wonderful commands for any user, such as ::master, ::pure, ::rich, etc...
I have downloads for the client and the server, both of which are delta-based. Hopefully we can get this made into an awesome 317 for Mopar. ( If you contribute your knowledge, you will be acknowledged in the credits Smiley )
DOWNLOAD CLIENT: http://uppit.com/v/PQDPFC6J
DOWNLOAD SERVER: http://uppit.com/v/MIULRJIS
I WILL ADD PICTURES SHORTLY, JUST FINISHED THIS RECENTLY :O

@fatwallet wrote:

WOW, because I can prove to you that they arent viruses: 1. ITS FROM DELTASCAPE, AND THE SOURCE HASN’T BEEN EDITED THOROUGHLY! 2. I have NO reason to virus anyone. i have the knowledge, but I know the consequences, and so I play it clean. 3. Post a picture of your “noob” scanner, and I hope its the “raw picture”, because anyone can photoshop a stupid anti-virus picture…
